text:
I would love to see a system in place where people have easy (and hopefully free) access to #Antiviral drugs and #chloroquine Phosphate, like #Aralen, or any other drug that might help to heal the #coronavirus #Covid_19 

Doctors should not be gatekeepers, at this point
